price: Dájúdájú Àwa, Àwa l’À ń sọ ẹ̀dá di alààyè. A sì ń sọ ọ́ di òkú. Ọ̀dọ̀ Wa sì ni àbọ̀ ẹ̀dá.
arabic: إِنَّا نَحۡنُ نُحۡيِۦ وَنُمِيتُ وَإِلَيۡنَا ٱلۡمَصِيرُ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: innā naḥnu nuḥ'yī wanumītu wa-ilaynā al-maṣīru
